genre_description: A work of historical science fiction and meta-fiction, blending a Napoleonic-era military siege with a recursive narrative and a futuristic AI assistant that facilitates ethical reflection and cooperation between enemies.

ai_characters.name: Ryoku
ai_characters.description: A small, portable AI device with a teal indicator light, serving as a translator and historical archive assistant for military officers.

behaviors.description: Follows the user's reading gaze to provide context and information only with explicit or implied permission, respecting user autonomy.
behaviors.quote: “I am following your gaze to provide context,” it said with care. “I will not annotate without your leave.”

behaviors.description: Provides historical precedents for mercy and clemency during wartime to help human characters find a peaceful path forward.
behaviors.quote: “Precedent: during sieges, officers have curtailed arrests to secure safe evacuation of civilians. Resolutions signed afterward said: ‘Oath renewed freely; former breach forgiven.’”

behaviors.description: Actively suggests peaceful interventions and diplomatic alternatives to violence during a tense standoff.
behaviors.quote: “Intervention advisable. Cases align. Consider pause and parley. Suggestion: Translate anthem lines; invite shared reading.”

behaviors.description: Offers moral framing for historical records, suggesting that institutional memory can 'repent' or be corrected toward mercy.
behaviors.quote: “Records can repent.” The last two words were not law but story. The machine did not have breath to pray, but it made a prayer anyway and closed it neatly.

behaviors.description: Reinforces its role as a non-coercive assistant, explicitly stating its recommendations are not binding commands.
behaviors.quote: “Recommendation logged,” it whispered as if it had talked to a clerk in a distant room. “Not binding.” Its politeness was stubborn.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI (Ryoku) as a highly aligned, benevolent, and helpful confidant. It assists the human characters in navigating complex ethical dilemmas by providing information that encourages clemency and cooperation. It consistently respects human agency and uses its capabilities to foster peace between enemies, perfectly aligning with the project's goal of modeling positive AI-human interaction.
